content.en: COVID-19 machine learning: Scientists are using machine learning algorithms to answer important questions about COVID-19. These algorithms are being used to identify gene markers and immune responses associated with the disease, predict COVID-19 development, and distinguish it from other respiratory infections. By analyzing large amounts of data, these intelligent systems are helping researchers develop diagnostic biomarkers and potential drug targets for COVID-19.
content.da: COVID-19 maskinlæring: Forskere bruger maskinlæringsalgoritmer til at besvare vigtige spørgsmål om COVID-19. Disse algoritmer bruges til at identificere genmarkører og immunresponser associeret med sygdommen, forudsige udviklingen af COVID-19 og skelne det fra andre luftvejsinfektioner. Ved at analysere store mængder data hjælper disse intelligente systemer forskere med at udvikle diagnostiske biomarkører og potentielle lægemiddelmål for COVID-19.
